CommentBody:
Setup an application for certificate authentication with required access level.
- Make sur the provider for the certificate is specified as Microsoft Enhanced RSA and AES Cryptographic Provider
- Run the below command (replacing redacted with relevant information for your environment)

.PingCastle.exe --azuread --clientid redacted --tenantid redacted --p12-file redacted --p12-pass redacted

- If that works for you then you can add these extra lines related to your Pro instance to connect via API.

endpoint http://pingcastle.domain.local --api-key {insert API key} --out "SchedulerLogsdomain.local.txt"

Also, here is a github link on creating the certificate.

https://github.com/netwrix/pingcastle/blob/master/Cloud/CreateSecureAppCert.ps1
